Name: Throne (Gold)
Description: Material used for breakthrough-level enhancement of weapons.

Description2$english: A Mystery Metal naturally formed in the Bapharian Ruins​. It appears golden but is not a terrestrial mineral. It grows slowly from the walls and domes of the ruins, containing unique Engram​ not found in surface minerals. It's exceptionally rare and special material.
